actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A resolution to reaffirm the use of our national motto on coins and currency.

summary.text: Declares that it is the sense of the House of Representatives that the national motto, "In God We Trust," shall be reaffirmed and shall continue to be engraved and printed on U.S. coins and currency.

titles.title: A resolution to reaffirm the use of our national motto on coins and currency.
